changeSet.author: a.sherstneva
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user ( id INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, name VARCHAR(15) NOT NULL, surname VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, gender VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, password VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, authority VARCHAR(10) DEFAULT "REGISTERED", enabled TINYINT DEFAULT 1, UNIQUE KEY email (email) );

changeSet.author: a.sherstneva
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user_job ( id INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, user_id INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, postoffice VARCHAR(30) NOT NULL, role VARCHAR(35) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user(id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE );

changeSet.author: a.sherstneva
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS user_details ( id INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, user_id INT UNSIGNED NOT NULL, birthday DATE, about TEXT, hobby TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user(id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE );
